# v1.0.0 Release Notes

## Features
- Initial Terraform configuration
- GitHub Actions workflow for validation
- Security scanning with tfsec and checkov
- Terraform linting with tflint
- JSON linting
- Dependency checking

## Dependencies
- Terraform >= 1.5.0
- TFLint v0.50.0
- Checkov (latest)
- TFSec v1.0.3

## Breaking Changes
- None (initial release)
